welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ensley, a charming city known for its history, friendly locals and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport houses all major airlines and provides access to various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Pensacola International Airport, primarily used for regional flights and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
